sentences.sContent: Not only might it have applications in fields such as microscopy, but it apparently also has the ability to optically store data forever.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not only might it have applications in fields such as microscopy, but it apparently also has the ability to optically store data forever.
sentences.sCn: 它不仅可以在诸如显微镜之类的领域得到应用，显然它同时也具有实现永久性光存储的能力。

sentences.sContent: An examination done on swabs from ulcers or smears from tissue biopsies that can be carried out rapidly at local health facilities where TB microscopy is also done.
sentences.sContent_eng: An examination done on swabs from ulcers or smears from tissue biopsies that can be carried out rapidly at local health facilities where TB microscopy is also done.
sentences.sCn: 对溃疡拭子或来自组织切片的涂片所做的一种检查，可在同时进行结核显微镜检查的地方卫生设施中快速进行。

synos.tran: [光][临床]显微镜检查；显微镜使用；显微镜学
